data.title: Mike Mora net worth, cause of death, kids, biography, what was known about Kelis’ husband?
data.meta_description: Mike Mora net worth, cause of death, kids, biography, what was known about Kelis’ husband? Mike Mora, an American real estate agent and photographer,
data.text:
Mike Mora, an American real estate agent and photographer, gained recognition as the husband of Kelis Rogers, a prominent American singer, songwriter, and chef, best known for her hit song “Milkshake.” Their marriage in 2014 was kept secret, and they welcomed their first child in 2015. His preference was to stay behind the camera rather than in the spotlight.

Mike Mora Biography & Profile Summary

Who is Mike Mora?

In the world of celebrities, it’s not uncommon for the spotlight to shine brightly on not only the stars themselves but also their significant others. One such individual who found himself in the midst of fame, albeit discreetly, was Mike Mora. Known as the husband of American singer and songwriter Kelis, Mike lived a life that captured the curiosity of many.

Early Life and Background

Mike Mora was born in New York, United States, and his nationality was American. Despite his connection to a renowned artist like Kelis, information about Mike’s parents, siblings, or early education remains a well-guarded secret. What we do know is that he attended Coral Gables High School and later pursued higher education at New York University.

The Multifaceted Career of Mike Mora

Mike Mora was not a man of one trade but rather a versatile individual with multiple talents. He made a name for himself as both a photographer and a real estate agent. His photography skills were showcased on his Instagram page, where he displayed an impressive portfolio of portraits, including those of his wife, Kelis, and stunning photographs of various animals.

Net Worth

As with many public figures, speculation about Mike Mora’s net worth circulated in the media. It was alleged that his net worth reached $300,000, although no official sources confirmed this figure. Nevertheless, he earned his income through his dual careers as a photographer and real estate agent.

Kelis and Mike Mora: A Private Wedding

The relationship between Kelis and Mike Mora was characterized by privacy. The couple reportedly tied the knot in 2014, keeping their wedding a well-kept secret. Details about how they first crossed paths and began their journey together remain undisclosed. Rumors also circulated that they dated for several months before deciding to take their vows.

Kelis and Mike Mora Kids

Kelis and Mike Mora’s union resulted in the birth of two children. Their first child, a son, arrived in 2015, followed by the birth of a daughter in 2020. Notably, Kelis had another child from her previous marriage with American rapper Nas, and Mike lovingly embraced the role of raising him as his own.

Mike Mora Battle with Illness

Tragically, his life took a somber turn when he was diagnosed with stage 4 stomach cancer. His struggle with stomach pains began in 2020, shortly after he and his family relocated to a farmhouse outside Los Angeles. Initially, he believed he had an ulcer caused by the rigors of working in scorching conditions, but the diagnosis of cancer shattered those hopes.

As of 2021, Mike continued to undergo treatment for his condition. Unfortunately, the prognosis was grim, with doctors suggesting he might have only 18 months left. On March 14, 2022, he passed away, succumbing to his battle with stage 4 stomach cancer. His death was confirmed by People, leaving his family and friends devastated.

Remembering Mike Mora

Mike Mora, though often referred to as a celebrity husband, was a talented photographer in his own right. He was not just a husband to Kelis but also an amazing father and a cherished friend to many. His genuine care and love for his family and friends will always be remembered.
